title: MoC releases refunds of Rs.6,000 million under DLTL: Dawood
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 23 (APP): The Adviser to Prime Minister on Commerce and Investment, Abdul Razak Dawood on Thursday said that Ministry of Commerce has released new refunds worth Rs. 6,000 million under the Drawback; on Local Taxes and Levies;(DLTL) schemes.
This includes Rs. 5,400 million for textile sector and Rs. 600 million for non-textile sectors, the Adviser on Commerce said this on his official twitter account.
“I hope this will resolve the liquidity issues of our exporters amid COVID-19 pandemic and enable them to enhance exports” he said.
